src.nn_library.base_network

Module Contents

Classes

Neural_network

Class to unify and optimize creation of neural networks using different set of parameters.
class src.nn_library.base_network.Neural_network(nn_architecture=src.nn_library.nn_architectures.architecture_A, input_shape=(64, 64, 3))

Class to unify and optimize creation of neural networks using different set of parameters.

compile(self, optimizer, loss_function, metrics)

Function to compile network using given params.

Parameters

  • optimizer – str optimizer name to be used in compilation

  • loss_function – tf.keras.losses object to measure loss funtionc

  • metrics – array of metrics to be measured

train_cnn_model(self, data: dict, epochs_num: int, checkpoint_filepath, batch_size)

Function to train network using given params.

Parameters

  • data – dict of test, train and validation data to be used in training

  • epochs_num – number of training iterations

  • checkpoint_filepath – str path to model checkpoint object

  • batch_size – batch size

test_network(self, data: dict, label_map, plot_probability)

Function to test network on given data.

Parameters

  • data – dict of test, train and validation data to be used in training

  • plot_probability – bool to define if class probability heatmap should be displayed

Returns

str network testing accuracy

init_network(self, layer_activation_function)

Function to initialize network object architecture.

Parameters

layer_activation_function – str name of nn layer activation function

plot_test_confusion_matrix(self, y_true, y_predicted, class_labels)

Function to display confusion matrix for network class predictions

Parameters

  • y_true – original class labels

  • y_predicted – class labels predicted by models

  • class_labels – list of all class labels

plot_model_result(self, mode, figure_num, text)

Function to plot network accuracy and loss function value over training (epochs).

Parameters

  • mode – str plotting mode, could be ‘accuracy’ or ‘loss’

  • figure_num – int number defining which plot to use

save_model(self, name, directory)

Function to save network in given directory with given name in .pb format, and .json file containing network details.

Parameters

  • name – network file name that will be saved

  • directory – directory where network file will be saved

single_class_prediction(self, input)

Function to perform prediction on given image.

Parameters

input – image form of numpy array

Returns

predicted class value

measure(self, data)
